name: Death Team
description:
One-player cooperative platformer where each of the three characters have different abilities. Use the amazing speed of Runner, the formidable aqualungs of Fishy and the extreme wall jumping skills of Ninja to collect all of the purple crystals.

The total size of the game is only 13 kB, and is was made with pure Javascript. Based on the tutorial game Hedgehog Apocalypse by Rex van der Spuy.  There are only three levels, so far.

Please let me know if you enjoy the game!

Controls

Arrow buttons: Jump, run left, run right

Space: Shoot

Shift: Change character

R: Restart game
